directionId.description: Direction in which the vehicle is headed. Derived from the direction in trips.txt: https://gtfs.org/documentation/schedule/reference/#tripstxt

lastAvi.description: The last AVI code that was emitted from the vehicle. If you are internal to the MBTA, see the documentation on AVI codes here https://github.com/mbta/rtr/blob/f734e361cb7361ec0cde461add8e1e1bfc938b74/docs/avi_codes.pdf

vehicleId.description: Unique identifier of the vehicle from OCS

routeId.description: Route that RTR thinks the vehicle is serving. Value is from GTFS trips.txt: https://gtfs.org/documentation/schedule/reference/#tripstxt

consist.description: Array containing car numbers of the train in order

orientation.description: Whether the 'rear' or 'front' of each train is facing forward for each train in the consist. B means backward, a means forward

nextStopId.description: Identifier for the next stop that the vehicle is at / approaching. From GTFS stops.txt: https://gtfs.org/documentation/schedule/reference/#stopstxt

stopStatus.description: What the train is doing in relation to the next stop

lat.description: The latitude of the train, provided by the AVL

lon.description: The longitude of the train, provided by the AVL
